brief_summary.textblock:
This is a post-marketing surveillance study on a marketed cetrizine hydrochloride
      formulation.

clinical_study.brief_title: Contac Bien Z Adverse Effect Survey

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Male and female participants, between 15-65 years of age, who purchase the marketed
             cetrizine hydrochloride formulation

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Who have ever experienced allergic symptoms by taking this medication or any
             component of this medication, piperazine derivative (including levocetirizine,
             hydroxizine)

          -  Those who have been under 15en diagnosed with kidney disease

          -  Children under 15 years of age

study_pop.textblock:
Participants who purchase the marketed cetrizine hydrochloride formulation from pharmacy
        stores in Japan.

intervention.description: As provided on the patient information leaflet

contact.last_name: US GSK Clinical Trials Call Center

contact_backup.last_name: EU GSK Clinical Trials Call Center

clinical_study.official_title: Contac Bien Z Adverse Effect Survey

overall_contact.last_name: US GSK Clinical Trials Call Center

oversight_info.authority: Pharmaceutical and Medical Devices Agency: Japan

primary_outcome.description: Participants will answer a questionnaire which consists of questions on safety of the marketed cetrizine hydrochloride formulation.
primary_outcome.measure: Adverse events after having cetrizine hydrochloride

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Participants will answer a questionnaire which consists of questions on their satisfaction after taking the marketed cetrizine hydrochloride formulation. The efficacy will be measured on a 4 point scale (1 Efficacious; 2 Somewhat efficacious; 3 Not efficacious; 4 Not known
secondary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of the marketed cetrizine hydrochloride formulation
